scenario_text.value:
So these are the shopping district ruins.
We’ll have to stay sharp while we’re here.
M’kay...

What is it?
You wanna talk about something?

Hey, Kaito? Everyone seems to be on edge,
but how are you doing?
Okay enough, I guess.

(Dracumon was really yelling.
Must be all the stress.)

(Who knows if Kaito will tell me straight
how he feels... Should I ask?)

(Maybe I should ask in an unusual way.
Or surprise him, then see how he reacts.)
(How should I get him to open up?)
Surprise him.
Ask a weird question.
Be direct.

(If I creep up from behind while he’s
looking at Haru...)

Uh, Takuma?
What are you doing?

Agumon!
Shh!

The heck you doing trying to sneak behind me
for, huh?
Oh, uh, I... Heh...
Seems like you were trying to surprise him.

I just wanted to see how you’re doing,
but I didn’t know if you’d tell me...

I thought if you’re stressed you’ll have
a really big reaction when I jump out.
What the hell?
It was just a random idea...

Actually, I don’t mind a good prank now
and then.
Me too! Me too!

Okay, I’ll talk. I’m worried Dracumon’s gonna
turn against me.
But then I realized I don’t need to worry.

Kaito’s not worried about you, Haru. Right,
Kaito?
Dude, I can speak for myself!

(Did I make him mad? At least now I can
hear how he really feels.)

I mean, if being suspicious of Dracumon means
I’m worried...

Then I guess I’ve been worried. I don’t wanna
expose Miu to any danger, after all.
But not now. I never really needed to worry.

Did you get mad because you’re worried?
I just wanted to ask.

You see other people as your little toys,
don’t you?
That’s n-not what I meant...

I was just worried...
that YOU might be worried.
I know you didn’t mean anything by it.

You have no reason to worry,
but I do wanna thank you.

From now on I’ll speak my mind more. That
way, no one gets worried about me.

I AM on the lookout for traitors, but I’m not
mad. Not worried, neither.

But we have to consider the chance Dracumon
might run with his tail between his legs.

You shouldn’t just jump to conclusions like
that. I feel bad for Dracumon.

If he does decide to fight back I’ll make
sure he regrets it.
Kaito! How can you say that!
...You don’t trust Dracumon at all.

We have no idea whether we can really trust
him, you know?

And don’t act like you understand when you
don’t have a monster following you around.
Right. I just feel sorry for them.
Sorry if I hurt your feelings.
Ugh...

(Come to think of it, neither Haru or Miyuki
have their own monsters.)

(What’s the difference between us and them?
Something to do with the shrine?)
Kaito...
Do you think Miu’s safe with Shakomon?
Yeah, they get along great.
I sure hope so.
